summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5283 for the improvement of 46th Avenue Southwest, from West Roxbury Street to Brace Point Drive; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 61106, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and authorizing the issuance of bonds.
